overview:
Dave McComb has spent the last 17 years leading technology projects. His varied experience includes information security at Goldman Sachs, leading the IT department of a small e-commerce company on its massive growth from 20 to over 200 employees in less than 2 years, founding and selling an ISP, and founding and creating the Clubplanet.com web site along with its many related businesses in the nightlife, ticketing and event promotion and marketing space.

Dave currently resides in Buenos Aires, Argentina and Killington, VT where we serves as President of McComb, Inc. His current projects include serving as advisor on a number of new web businesses as well as managing IT projects.

He is actively involved in real estate investment and is working on a new business venture in Buenos Aires set to launch in 2011.
